items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Girls Trip
items.body: The quality of this dress is perfect. I enjoyed how sexy and fun I looked for such a great price. The shaping of the dress allows for a comfortable fit while hugging your hips and curves in a way that feels light and can be worn all night. Wore this dress for a girls trip~ Read more
items.author: Sydney Carter

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing dress
items.body: This dress was the STAR of my engagement photos. No one believed me it was from Amazon! The material is double lined, not see through, and very stretchy! The fabric is soft and slightly slick so when it was in the water and wet, it barely looked wet! This dress is worth way more than $30 IMO, for the quality. Such a gorgeous dress, made me feel so confident on this special day & i will cherish the photos forever! Read more
items.author: Sydney

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A comfortable fun black dress
items.body: I wanted to leave some photos so you can have my body size for reference if youâ€™re on the fence. Firstly this is a great dress! The material is awesome it doesnâ€™t wrinkle so itâ€™s great to travel with! I found it to be very flattering! I am 5â€™4 and weigh 160 and I bought a medium, it was a great fit! I didnâ€™t find it too long so that was good. The fabric that covers your boobs does shift around a bit ðŸ˜… I had bought some Bare Babe nipple covers so I was fine all night but I did find that the fabric had shifted upwards and the â€œunderboobâ€ was mainly full boob exposed ðŸ˜­ðŸ˜‚ (it was dark and no one noticed but I did keep readjusting throughout the night) besides that itâ€™s a nice dress and very comfortable. I would suggest this dress for anyone going out but if youâ€™re going dancing or have larger boobs Definitely buy some covers to keep the nip slips at bay! Read more

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Looks cheap
items.body: This did not fit as expected. It also looked a little too much like lingerie. I ordered the medium but probably should have went with a small because it was loose around the waist. I thought it would look more like a two piece on one side but it looked like something that was improperly made. Im tall 5â€™11 and I have a very tiny waist and it just was not very flattering to me. I think maybe a shorter person would look better in it and maybe someone with a more curved figure. Read more
items.author: Raye

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute but cheap
items.body: The top portion is super cute but the skirt is poorly sewn and cheap material Read more

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Do it, treat yourself. Look like a bad ass.
items.body: YOU WILL FEEL SENSUAL AND CONFIDENT. Trust yourself and buy it. I love the thickness of the body, no bra needed (size down), stretches and good quality. Like you can go out dancing and you canâ€™t tell how much youâ€™re sweating. Read more

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Maxi Bodycon Formal Cocktail Evening is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Maxi Bodycon Formal Cocktail Evening is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Wine Red, Pink, White, Sage Green, Black, Coffee. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
